name: The Final Rescue
description:
The Final Rescue is escape puzzle room game with mechanics of rotating rooms.
You are the only survivor. You found out that a scientist was working on antidote. In hope of finding something you visit his house.

Game contains mysterious rooms, exciting puzzles and a great story. You need to solve puzzles, collect items to unlock doors, items .You have two options to select game style.


Features:


    1. Room Rotation Mechanics
    2. Two Gameplay Animations
    3. Beautiful Graphics
    4. Many Puzzles
